pages.text: Tiltros is a land ravaged by ravines and cliffs. The stony walls drop down into deep pits of lava and deepslate. The exposed stone makes it exceptionally easy to find ores.$(br)Of course, with this easy access there are going to be lots of things trying to destroy you.

Dangerous creatures like $(l:hostile_creatures/lava_revenant)lava revenants$(), $(l:hostile_creatures/rock_spider)rock spiders$(), and $(l:hostile_creatures/celestial_tower)celestial towers$() spawn here. It is almost necessary to have an Elytra to travel, as you will not be able to outrun the majority of creatures.$(br2)Additionally with travel, using Tiltros to move can allow you to move quickly in the overworld; one block there is equal to 16 blocks here.
